The bars are color-coded to distinguish between the years. The 2018 bars are blue, the 2023 bars are green, and the 2028 bars are orange. The values are given in billions of euros (bn/EUR). The market value for menswear has grown from 9.8 billion euros in 2018 to 10.2 billion euros in 2023 and is expected to reach 10.6 billion euros by 2028. The market value for childrenswear has risen from 5.4 billion euros in 2018 to 5.5 billion euros in 2023 and is forecasted to reach 5.6 billion euros by 2028. Here's a breakdown of the information presented:  - Clothing: This category has the largest market share across all years, ranging from 18.7% in 2018 to 20.4% in 2028.
